content: Hi all! I am Erko Jakobson, I was NCAR visitor in 2019-2020. Now I work in the Tartu observatory of the University of Tartu, Estonia, interested in climate change and climate extremes in the Baltic Sea region. I have analyzed mostly CESM1-LE and CMIP6 data. Now I hope to move on to analyze CESM2-LE and CORDEX climate data. And I really miss the Mesa atmosphere. Enjoy it!
